alert.note: Alert for Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 1:14AM CDT until July 09 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of the Panhandle of Oklahoma, including the following county, Texas. Portions of the Panhandle of Texas, including the following counties, Hansford and Ochiltree. * WHEN...Until 715 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 114 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Spearman, Waka and Farnsworth. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
